Sentencas: Nano-powders of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x (LSC) and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x (SSC) compositions, which are being investigated as cathode materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) with La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3-x (LSGM) as the electrolyte, were synthesized by low-temperature sol-gel method using metal nitrates and citric acid.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x cathode nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thermal decomposition of the citrate gels was followed by simultaneous DSC/TGA methods.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x cathode nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Development of phases in the gels, on heat treatments at various temperatures, was monitored by X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x cathode nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Sol-gel powders calcined at 550-1000 degrees C consisted of a number of phases.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x cathode nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single perovskite phase La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x or Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x powders were obtained at 1200 degrees C and 1300 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x cathode nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Morphological analysis of the powders calcined at various temperatures was done by scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x cathode nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The average crystallite size of the powders was,similar to 15 nm after 700 degrees C calcinations and slowly increased to 70-100 nm after heat treatments at 1300-1400 degrees C. Published by Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Sol-gel synthesis of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-x and Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-x cathode nanopowders for solid oxide fuel cells
